articles.title: Prince William awards Marcus Rashford the MBE at Windsor Castle - Daily Mail
articles.description: Marcus Rashford, 24, received his MBE for leading the fight against child poverty during a ceremony hosted by Prince William at Windsor Castle today.
articles.content:
Footballer Marcus Rashford will give his MBE to his mother after receiving the honour during a ceremony hosted by Prince William at Windsor Castle today.
